Articles.Content: YES!!
BEAUTIFUL!
There it is! Dat sunset, doe! Evening came, and morning followed... a new day.
video rights will be valuable
YEEEEEEEEES

That red hot grid fin and the paint peeling off got me worried.

 

ELON!!
Was there video of the landing? I saw it go black, a "Falcon has returned again" announcement, and then the camera turned back on with a rocket in front of it.

Just now, HebaruSan said:

Was there video of the landing? I saw it go black, a "Falcon has returned again" announcement, and then the camera turned back on with a rocket in front of it.

It may take a few days but you bet your sweet booster they'll be publishing the recoding.
Presumably the usual happened - they lost signal during the landing. But they keep on-board recordings to distribute later.
Nah, apparently the satellite video link doesn't work through the exhaust plume.
God my heart stopped

Nice little speech from Elon. who looks like he wasn't able to sleep last night!

3 minutes ago, HebaruSan said:

Was there video of the landing? I saw it go black, a "Falcon has returned again" announcement, and then the camera turned back on with a rocket in front of it.

There will be video, it's stored on the ship. The rocket landing makes it lose the live satellite feed.

That was simply awesome! Too busy watching full-screen to post during the flight

ninja'd, of course

Edited March 30, 2017 by StrandedonEarth

When will be 3rd flight of this booster?

I'm excited to see landing later after recordings are recovered...

Woot woot!! SpaceX has done it again!

Anyone else hear unconfirmed rumors of a planned attempted fairing recovery for today's launch?

YEEEEEEEEEE

Spoiler



EEEEEEEEEEEEES!

 

WOOOOHOOO!

 

We now live in the future!
Woohoo! This is so cool! Just slap on a new coat of paint and she's ready to fly again!
Awesome, just awesome. I'll wait on what the spreadsheets say on actual savings in the future, but this was an amazing accomplishment.
GAH! I've run out of likes!

Just now, Spaceception said:

GAH! I've run out of likes!

Ditto.
That landing looked like it was a perfect bullseye, yet more proof that SaceX knows their stuff.

Just now, Spaceception said:

GAH! I've run out of likes!

Same!

This thread has used up my allotment of likes for today.

The Age of Re-flight has begun!

(Ok, Shuttle did reflight too, but with an much, much more expensive turnaround)
I want to see the little pad robot.

5 minutes ago, Toonu said:

When will be 3rd flight of this booster?

I'm excited to see landing later after recordings are recovered...

Hopefully soon.
